titleStmt.title: To the priests and people of England, we discharge our consicences, and give them warning.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Priscilla.
Cole, Mary, fl. 1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Giles Calvert at the Black-spread-Eagle, neer the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Priscilla Cotton, Mary Cole.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
